title: The Forlorn lover: declaring how a lass gave her lover three slipps for a teaster, and married another a week before Easter. / To a pleasant new tune.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: torn and cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
